attributes.action: to sing "We're Going To Hang Out The Washing On The Siegfried Line" through a megaphone while standing in a barrel of custard outside Parliament.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: From the BBC idea i want to see it so, ask the PM to sing "We're Going To Hang Out The Washing On The Siegfried Line" through a megaphone while standing in a barrel of custard outside Parliament!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
